__e: In our location between Provence and the Rhône, it is with energy and passion that we make wine worthy of the finest tables on this estate which dates from 1615. Welcome to le Chateau de Bacchus.
We were in Provence... and I asked our waiter, "What are all these little herbs sprinkled on everything?"
Provence and the Luberon as you have never seen !
